alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of Coconino County near Tuba City through 615 PM MST... At 544 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Tonalea to 7 miles west of Coalmine Canyon Chapter House. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuba City, Cow Springs, Coalmine Canyon Chapter House, Tonalea, Moenkopi and Hopi. This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 358. Highway 160 between mile markers 316 and 353. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
